description.zh-cn: 中国建筑史学家、建筑师、城市规划师、建筑教育家，一生致力于保护中国古代建筑和文化遗产。曾任中央研究院院士、中国科学院学部委员，创办了东北大学和清华大学的建筑系。
description.en: A Chinese architectural historian, architect, urban planner, and educator who dedicated his life to preserving ancient Chinese architecture and cultural heritage. He was an academician of Academia Sinica, a member of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, and founded the architecture departments at Northeastern University and Tsinghua University.

description.zh-cn: 清朝末年政治家，戊戌变法领袖之一，梁思成的父亲。
description.en: A politician in the late Qing dynasty, one of the leaders of the Hundred Days' Reform, and the father of Liang Sicheng.

description.zh-cn: 梁启超的原配夫人，梁思成的母亲。
description.en: The first wife of Liang Qichao and the mother of Liang Sicheng.

description.zh-cn: 中国建筑师、诗人和作家，梁思成的第一任妻子。
description.en: A Chinese architect, poet, and writer, the first wife of Liang Sicheng.

nodes.id: 林洙 (梁思成第二任妻子)

zh-cn: 林洙 (梁思成第二任妻子)

description.zh-cn: 梁思成的第二任妻子。
description.en: The second wife of Liang Sicheng.

description.zh-cn: 梁思成与林徽因之子，历史学家，环保活动家。
description.en: Son of Liang Sicheng and Lin Huiyin, historian and environmental activist.

description.zh-cn: 梁思成与林徽因之女。
description.en: Daughter of Liang Sicheng and Lin Huiyin.

description.zh-cn: 梁思成的弟弟。
description.en: Younger brother of Liang Sicheng.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国时期的一场政治运动，期间梁思成受到批判和迫害。
description.en: A political movement in the People's Republic of China, during which Liang Sicheng was criticized and persecuted.

description.zh-cn: 清华大学的前身，梁思成曾在此就读。
description.en: The predecessor of Tsinghua University, where Liang Sicheng studied.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代教育史上第一个建筑学系，由梁思成创办。
description.en: The first department of architecture in the history of modern Chinese education, founded by Liang Sicheng.

description.zh-cn: 由梁思成于1946年创办的建筑系。
description.en: The department of architecture founded by Liang Sicheng in 1946.

en: Society for Research in Chinese Architecture

description.zh-cn: 一个致力于研究中国古代建筑的学术机构。
description.en: An academic institution dedicated to the study of ancient Chinese architecture.

zh-cn: 关于中央人民政府行政中心位置的建议

description.zh-cn: 由梁思成和陈占祥于1950年提出的一份关于北京城市规划的建议，主张保护北京古城，在西郊建设新的行政中心。该方案未被采纳。
description.en: A proposal for Beijing's urban planning submitted by Liang Sicheng and Chen Zhanxiang in 1950, advocating for the preservation of the old city of Beijing and the construction of a new administrative center in the western suburbs. The proposal was not adopted.

description.zh-cn: 中国城市规划师，与梁思成共同提出《梁陈方案》。
description.en: A Chinese urban planner who co-authored the Liang-Chen Proposal with Liang Sicheng.

description.zh-cn: 位于北京天安门广场的纪念碑，梁思成主持了其建筑设计。
description.en: A monument in Tiananmen Square, Beijing, whose architectural design was led by Liang Sicheng.

en: National Emblem of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国徽，梁思成参与了其设计工作。
description.en: The national emblem of the People's Republic of China, in whose design Liang Sicheng participated.

description.zh-cn: 为纪念唐代高僧鉴真而建的纪念堂，由梁思成设计。
description.en: A memorial hall built to commemorate the Tang dynasty monk Jianzhen, designed by Liang Sicheng.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 清朝末年由光绪帝和维新派推动的政治改革运动，梁启超是主要领导人之一。
description.en: A political reform movement in the late Qing dynasty promoted by the Guangxu Emperor and reformists, with Liang Qichao as one of its main leaders.

description.zh-cn: 清朝末年实际统治者，因迫害维新派导致梁启超流亡海外。
description.en: The de facto ruler of the late Qing dynasty, whose persecution of reformists led to Liang Qichao's exile.

description.zh-cn: 推翻清朝、建立中华民国的革命。革命后梁思成随家人从日本回国。
description.en: The revolution that overthrew the Qing dynasty and established the Republic of China. After the revolution, Liang Sicheng returned to China from Japan with his family.

description.zh-cn: 梁思成的出生地，其父梁启超曾在此流亡。抗日战争期间为中国的敌国。
description.en: Liang Sicheng's birthplace, where his father Liang Qichao was exiled. It was China's enemy during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 日本首都，梁思成的出生地。
description.en: Capital of Japan, birthplace of Liang Sicheng.

description.zh-cn: 中国抵抗日本侵略的战争。战争爆发后，梁思成携家人迁往中国西南地区。
description.en: The war of Chinese resistance against Japanese invasion. After the war broke out, Liang Sicheng moved with his family to Southwest China.

description.zh-cn: 日本古都。有说法称梁思成曾建议盟军在轰炸日本时保护该城市，但此说法存在争议。
description.en: An ancient capital of Japan. It is said that Liang Sicheng suggested the Allied forces protect the city during the bombing of Japan, but this claim is disputed.

description.zh-cn: 日本古都。有说法称梁思成曾建议盟军在轰炸日本时保护该城市，但此说法存在争议。
description.en: An ancient capital of Japan. It is said that Liang Sicheng suggested the Allied forces protect the city during the bombing of Japan, but this claim is disputed.

description.zh-cn: 梁思成曾在此留学和任教。二战期间，作为盟军主力对日本进行轰炸。
description.en: The country where Liang Sicheng studied and taught. During World War II, it was the main Allied force bombing Japan.

description.zh-cn: 北洋政府陆军部次长，其轿车于1923年撞伤梁思成，致其残疾。
description.en: Vice Minister of the Army of the Beiyang Government, whose car hit and injured Liang Sicheng in 1923, causing him a permanent disability.

description.zh-cn: 宋代李诫编著的建筑学巨著，梁思成一生研究并为其作注。
description.en: A monumental architectural treatise written by Li Jie in the Song dynasty, which Liang Sicheng studied and annotated throughout his life.

description.zh-cn: 国民政府主席。文革期间，梁思成因家中藏有一把刻有“中正赠”的军刀而被定为罪状之一。
description.en: Chairman of the Nationalist Government. During the Cultural Revolution, Liang Sicheng was accused partly because a military sword engraved with 'Gift of Zhongzheng' was found in his home.

description.zh-cn: 中国建筑史学家，与梁思成同为“建筑五宗师”之一，曾在中国营造学社共事。
description.en: Chinese architectural historian, one of the 'Five Masters of Architecture' along with Liang Sicheng, and a colleague at the Society for Research in Chinese Architecture.

description.zh-cn: 梁思成是梁启超的儿子。
description.en: Liang Sicheng is the son of Liang Qichao.

description.zh-cn: 梁思成是李蕙仙的儿子。
description.en: Liang Sicheng is the son of Li Huixian.

description.zh-cn: 梁思成与林徽因为夫妻关系，直至林徽因逝世。
description.en: Liang Sicheng and Lin Huiyin were married until her death.

relationships.target: 林洙 (梁思成第二任妻子)

description.zh-cn: 梁思成与林洙为夫妻关系，直至梁思成逝世。
description.en: Liang Sicheng and Lin Zhu were married until his death.

description.zh-cn: 梁从诫是梁思成的儿子。
description.en: Liang Congjie is the son of Liang Sicheng.

description.zh-cn: 梁再冰是梁思成的女儿。
description.en: Liang Zaibing is the daughter of Liang Sicheng.

description.zh-cn: 梁思成和梁思永是兄弟关系。
description.en: Liang Sicheng and Liang Siyong are brothers.

description.zh-cn: 1915年至1923年在清华学校读书，并于1923年毕业于高等科。
description.en: Studied at Tsinghua School from 1915 to 1923, and graduated from its advanced course in 1923.

description.zh-cn: 1924年赴宾夕法尼亚大学建筑系学习，1927年获得学士和硕士学位。
description.en: He went to study in the Department of Architecture at the University of Pennsylvania in 1924 and received his bachelor's and master's degrees in 1927.

description.zh-cn: 在哈佛大学研究院学习建筑史，但未毕业。
description.en: Studied architectural history at the Harvard University Graduate School, but did not graduate.

description.zh-cn: 梁思成于1928年创办了东北大学建筑系，这是中国现代教育史上第一个建筑学系。
description.en: In 1928, Liang Sicheng founded the Department of Architecture at Northeastern University, the first of its kind in the history of modern Chinese education.

description.zh-cn: 梁思成于1946年回到北平后，创办了清华大学建筑系（时称营建学系）。
description.en: After returning to Beiping in 1946, Liang Sicheng founded the Department of Architecture (then known as the Department of Construction) at Tsinghua University.

position.en: Director of the Department of Architectural Regulations and Methods

description.zh-cn: 梁思成于1931年回到北平后，进入中国营造学社工作。
description.en: After returning to Beiping in 1931, Liang Sicheng joined the Society for Research in Chinese Architecture.

position.en: Head of the Department of Architecture

description.zh-cn: 1946年，梁思成出任清华大学建筑系主任。
description.en: In 1946, Liang Sicheng became the head of the Department of Architecture at Tsinghua University.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，梁思成被作为“反动学术权威”受到批判、抄家和迫害，最终在贫病交加中去世。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Liang Sicheng was persecuted as a 'reactionary academic authority', criticized, his home was ransacked, and he eventually died in poverty and illness.

description.zh-cn: 梁思成与陈占祥共同提出《关于中央人民政府行政中心位置的建议》（梁陈方案），主张保护北京古城，但建议未被采纳。
description.en: Liang Sicheng, along with Chen Zhanxiang, proposed the 'Suggestions on the Location of the Administrative Center of the Central People's Government' (the Liang-Chen Proposal), advocating for the preservation of old Beijing, but the proposal was not adopted.

description.zh-cn: 陈占祥与梁思成共同提出《关于中央人民政府行政中心位置的建议》（梁陈方案）。
description.en: Chen Zhanxiang, along with Liang Sicheng, proposed the 'Suggestions on the Location of the Administrative Center of the Central People's Government' (the Liang-Chen Proposal).

description.zh-cn: 梁思成主持了人民英雄纪念碑的建筑设计。
description.en: Liang Sicheng led the architectural design of the Monument to the People's Heroes.

description.zh-cn: 梁思成于1963年设计了扬州鉴真和尚纪念堂。
description.en: Liang Sicheng designed the Jianzhen Memorial Hall in Yangzhou in 1963.

description.zh-cn: 在戊戌变法失败后，慈禧太后迫害维新派人士，导致梁启超流亡海外。
description.en: After the failure of the Hundred Days' Reform, Empress Dowager Cixi persecuted reformers, causing Liang Qichao to flee into exile.

description.zh-cn: 1912年辛亥革命后，梁思成随父母从日本回国。
description.en: After the Xinhai Revolution in 1912, Liang Sicheng returned to China from Japan with his parents.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争爆发后，梁思成为躲避战乱，携全家离开北平，前往西南地区。
description.en: After the outbreak of the Second Sino-Japanese War, Liang Sicheng left Beiping with his family and moved to Southwest China to escape the war.

description.zh-cn: 据称，在盟军对日本进行总攻击时，梁思成建议美军保护日本古都京都和奈良免于轰炸。然而，此说法尚存争议。
description.en: It is reported that during the Allied general attack on Japan, Liang Sicheng suggested that the US military protect the ancient Japanese capitals of Kyoto and Nara from bombing. However, this claim is still disputed.

description.zh-cn: 1923年5月7日，北洋政府陆军部次长金永炎的轿车撞伤了梁思成，导致其右腿留下终身残疾。
description.en: On May 7, 1923, the car of Jin Yongyan, Vice Minister of the Army of the Beiyang Government, hit Liang Sicheng, causing a permanent disability in his right leg.

description.zh-cn: 1925年，梁启超将宋代李诫所著的《营造法式》寄给在美国留学的梁思成，引发了他对中国古建筑的研究兴趣。
description.en: In 1925, Liang Qichao sent a copy of 'Yingzao Fashi' by Li Jie of the Song Dynasty to Liang Sicheng, who was studying in the United States, sparking his interest in the study of ancient Chinese architecture.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，梁思成家中发现一把刻有“中正赠”的军刀，这成为他的一大罪状，加剧了对他的迫害。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, a military sword engraved with 'Gift of Zhongzheng (Chiang Kai-shek)' was found in Liang Sicheng's home, which became one of the major accusations against him and intensified his persecution.

description.zh-cn: 梁思成与刘敦桢曾在中国营造学社共事，并一同进行川康地区的古建筑调查。
description.en: Liang Sicheng and Liu Dunzhen worked together at the Society for Research in Chinese Architecture and jointly conducted investigations of ancient architecture in the Sichuan-Kangding area.

description.zh-cn: 梁思成于1959年1月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Liang Sicheng joined the Communist Party of China in January 1959.

description.zh-cn: 梁思成于1901年4月20日出生于日本东京。
description.en: Liang Sicheng was born in Tokyo, Japan on April 20, 1901.
